itunes:title: Exodus Week 1 with Jen Wilkin
title: Exodus Week 1 with Jen Wilkin
description:
This week on the She Reads Truth podcast, Raechel and Amanda, along with author and Bible teacher Jen Wilkin, kick off a six-week study of the book of Exodus. We serve a God of deliverance, the same God who delivered His people in the book of Exodus and all throughout Scripture. Join us for this week’s episode as Raechel, Amanda, and Jen remind us of the value of waiting faithfully for the Lord’s deliverance in our own lives, a wait that is always worth it.


Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 1 of the She Reads Truth Exodus reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Exodus collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/exodus-week-1-with-jen-wilkin
